column2: The Kingdom of Carolina is formed.
Titles outside of the true land of Carolina will be lost.

Long ago, these lands were once a part of the Kingdom of Carolina. However, that didn't last and it was split into the Kingdoms of North Carolina and South Carolina, which later became the Kingdoms of Tarheel and Palmetto, respectively. Now, however, I stand poised to reestablish the old united Kingdom of Carolina.
The Kingdom of Dixieland is formed.
Titles outside of the true land of Dixieland will be lost.

These lands are at the very heart of Dixie. Long ago, the Kingdoms Georgia and Tuskegee were united and joined as one, whereas now they are separate. Now, however, I stand poised to reestablish the old Kingdom of Dixieland.
